name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Delicious pepperoni pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and pepperoni slices.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A delightful vegetarian pizza loaded with assorted fresh vegetables and cheese.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Tasty BBQ chicken pizza featuring barbecue sauce, chicken, red onions, and cheese.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: Classic Hawaiian pizza with ham, pineapple, tomato sauce, and mozzarella.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
description: A carnivore's delight! Loaded with a variety of meats, tomato sauce, and cheese.

name: Spinach and Feta Pizza
description: Healthy and delicious pizza with spinach, feta cheese, tomato sauce, and olives.

name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
description: Spicy buffalo chicken pizza with buffalo sauce, chicken, and blue cheese.

name: Mexican Fiesta Pizza
description: A fiesta of flavors with spicy Mexican toppings, tomato sauce, and melted cheese.

name: Supreme Pizza
description: The ultimate pizza experience with a combination of various toppings and cheese.
